settings.feature_item_1: Small and thin design - like a pack of playing cards (±75x61x14mm)

settings.benefits_title: Understand and take control of your bladder
settings.benefit_1_description: With our sensor, you can get to know your bladder better, and actively control to improve it
settings.benefit_2_description: Create automatic statistics of your voidings to understand your personal patterns.
settings.benefit_3_description: Our sensor provides peace of mind and security, so you can go about your day with confidence.
settings.benefit_4_description: Get discreet vibrations when it's time to go to the bathroom, to ensure your privacy.

settings.cta_title: Wonder if our bladder sensor is for you?
settings.cta_description: Start doing our 2 minute test to see how our bladder sensor can help you.

settings.app_details_description: Set up your digital voiding diary and get smart push notifications on your phone and your wrist.

settings.feature_image_left_description: Receive notifications that remind you when it’s time to go to the bathroom. With these reminders, you can avoid accidents and maintain greater control over your bladder.
settings.feature_image_left_modal_description: Our app features intelligent notifications that are designed to help you stay on top of your bathroom routines, ensuring greater control and minimizing accidents.  With our smart notifications, you hopefully worry less about missing crucial bathroom breaks. The sensor and/or the app will remind you when it's time to visit the restroom based on personalized estimations. When the bladder is almost full, the sensor will provide a gentle vibration. In addition, the connected smart device will give a notification via the app. These proactive reminders ensure that you maintain a consistent bathroom schedule, reducing the risk of accidents and promoting better bladder control. Additional features of the app may include reminders for your bladder training exercises. Consistency is key in strengthening your bladder muscles, and our app will ensure that you stay on track with your training program. By leveraging the power of these personalized notifications, the sensor and correlating app can serve as a reliable and supportive companion in your bladder health journey. Let our sensor empower you to achieve a life with improved bladder control, greater confidence, and freedom from the worries of accidents.

settings.feature_image_right_description: The app allows for automatic logging of voiding behavior over time. No manual (paper) logs needed. This information can be shared with your doctor and used to identify patterns and to develop effective treatment strategies.
settings.feature_image_right_modal_description: Tracking your bathroom habits can be tough, especially when done with pen and paper as a lot of doctors are asking for initially when treating bladder related symptoms. The sensor automatically tracks your voiding patterns, therefore serving as a powerful tool to monitor your voiding behavior over time. By analysing this information, you can identify patterns and trends that may be contributing to your incontinence or other bladder-related issues. Additional features of the app may include manual tracking of the amount you drink or if/when an unwanted urinary leakage occurred. Our app allows you to easily share this data with healthcare professionals or specialists who are part of your care team. This collaboration enables them to have a comprehensive view of your bladder health, facilitating more accurate diagnoses and targeted treatment plans.

settings.feature_image_left_description: Need additional support? Connect with a specialist who can provide personalized advice and guidance. Whether you have questions about your condition or need help                     managing symptoms, our experts are here to help.
settings.feature_image_left_modal_description: Whether you have questions about your condition or need help                     managing symptoms, our experts are here to help. We understand that navigating through bladder-related challenges can be overwhelming at times. That's why our app goes beyond just providing a comprehensive training course. We offer additional support by connecting you with dedicated specialists who are ready to provide personalized advice and guidance, tailored to your specific needs.  If you find yourself needing assistance in managing your symptoms, our specialists are equipped to provide valuable insights and practical strategies. They will work closely with you, taking into account your unique circumstances and preferences.  Connecting with our specialists is easy through our app. You can schedule virtual consultations or engage in secure messaging, allowing you to communicate with confidence and convenience. Rest assured that your privacy and confidentiality are of utmost importance to us.  We believe that no one should face bladder health challenges alone.

settings.feature_image_right_description: A comprehensive bladder training course that is tailored to your individual needs. The program will guide you through a series of exercises and techniques to help you strengthen your                     bladder muscles and reduce symptoms.
settings.feature_image_right_modal_description: Additional upcoming features of the app may include a comprehensive bladder training course, meticulously designed to address your unique symptoms. Our program offers a step-by-step journey that will empower you to regain control over your bladder and overcome those troublesome symptoms that have been affecting your daily life. Through a series of carefully curated exercises and techniques, we aim to strengthen your bladder muscles and “re-calibrating” your feeling of whether your bladder is actually full or not. The bladder training will help to improve bladder control and a reduction in related symptoms.  Upon joining, you will undergo an initial assessment to determine the current state of your bladder health. Based on this assessment, we suggest a training plan that fits to your individual situation.  Throughout the program, our medical experts are available in case you have any questions and support to help you reach your goals. Consistency is key, and with regular practice, you can experience improvements in your bladder control, a reduction in frequency and urgency, as well as an overall improvement in your quality of life.

settings.monthly_plan_description: Rent your bladder sensor on a monthly basis

settings.quarterly_plan_description: Rent your bladder sensor for 3 months

settings.one_time_purchase_explainer: Adhesive materials can be bought seperately at our Sensa Online Shop.

settings.pricing_description_append: per month on incontinence pads and pants. We believe our bladder sensor should be accessible to everybody with a simple rental modell.
settings.pricing_hint_terms_taxes: Prices in GBP. Taxes may apply.

settings.faq_accordion_question: Is the sensor visible under my (tight) clothes, e.g. sport apparel?
settings.faq_accordion_answer: We know discreteness is key so we designed the sensor to be as thin as possible. If you wear normal fitting apparel, the sensor will not be visible. If you are wearing very tight sport apparel, the sensor might be visible.

settings.faq_accordion_question: Will it interfere with my belt?
settings.faq_accordion_answer: The sensor is placed below the “belt” region, just above the pubic bone, so it should not interfere when you are wearing a belt.

settings.faq_accordion_question: Does it work with body hair?
settings.faq_accordion_answer: In general, our silicone adhesives are designed to work with body hair. However, too much body hair might impact the strength of the adhesive so we would recommend to shave off body hair when you experience problems attaching the sensor to your belly.

settings.faq_accordion_question: Will the vibration stimulate my bladder?
settings.faq_accordion_answer: The vibration strength can be adapted to the level you feel comfortable with.

settings.faq_accordion_question: Do notifications work as pre-warning? How much time do I get?
settings.faq_accordion_answer: That depends on your condition and symptoms. You can specify in the app, at what filling status you would like to get a notification, thereby you are able to personalize the notifications to your voiding patterns.

settings.faq_accordion_question: Can it fall of while running, doing sports activities?
settings.faq_accordion_answer: The adhesives are designed to work for sports activities.

settings.faq_accordion_question: Can I wear it at night?
settings.faq_accordion_answer: Yes you can. If you sleep a lot on your belly, this might feel uncomfortable over time though.

settings.faq_accordion_question: Will the sensor prevent me from using absorptive products?
settings.faq_accordion_answer: From our users we know that at first you will still use absorptive products as a safety net. Over time the usage of absorptive products might decrease over time as the sensor gets adapted to your situation and you understand your bladder and symptoms better.

settings.faq_accordion_question: Why a deposit? When do I get it back?
settings.faq_accordion_answer: The sensor is an innovative piece of hardware that costs more than $500 when purchased. In order to be able to offer the service as a rental model, we need to charge a deposit that we reimburse as soon as we receive your sensor in good shape. Think of it like a car rental.

Think of the sensor as miniature version of the ultrasound scanners you know from a hospital of gynecologists. It uses the same methodology that doctors use for a long time, it is just so small you can actually wear it on your body and carry it with you.

The sensor detects the front and back-wall of the bladder and determine the volume in between. It provides a notification when the bladder is almost full, and it is time to go to the bathroom.

Notifications will be provided via a gentle vibration of the device and/or smart notification via the app. Preferred notification settings can be adjusted in the app.

settings.faq_accordion_question: How is the data collected in the voiding diary?
settings.faq_accordion_answer: The sensor regularly scan the filling status of your bladder. This enables the app to calculate how the filling status is changing and logs the differences automatically in the app.

settings.faq_accordion_question: How long can I use the sensor?
settings.faq_accordion_answer: The sensor is designed to work for years. Each 2 years we recommend a maintainance service interval to recalibrate the sensor and clean the device.

settings.faq_accordion_question: How long does the battery last? When do I need to recharge?
settings.faq_accordion_answer: The battery lasts for ± 1.5-2 days, the charging time is ± 1.5-2 hours.
